  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

  • Storage: 10 MB available space
